decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided to ensure proper waste management in the interests of the character and appearance of the area and the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers, in conflict with policy SI17 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate secure cycle storage facilities in conflict with policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 7 (Cycle Parking Facilities) and 8 (Waste and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission 23/00567/OUT (Outline application for demolition of existing dance studio and erection of a three storey building housing 9nos 3-bed flats with associated bins and cycle provision. Formation of drop kerb to provide 6 parking space (Landscape reserve matter).)
